options.name: Grapplemaster
options.description: A Creature that is Grappled by you has a 1d4 Penalty to their Attack Rolls.

options.name: Leverage
options.description: You can Shove and Grapple Creatures that are one Size larger than you.

options.name: Improvised Attacks
options.description: Gain +1 Attack with Crushing Weapons and Unarmed Attacks

options.name: Free Action : Powershove
options.description: When you make a successful Shove Action, you both displace and knock the creature Prone instead of choosing between the two.

options.name: Reaction : Reversal
options.description: When a Creature attempts to Shove or Grapple you, gain a 1d4 Bonus to your roll. If you win the Check, you can choose to Shove or Grapple the Creature.

options.name: Action : Slam
options.description: When you have a target Grappled or are adjacent to a target that is Prone, you make an Unarmed Attack on them that is upgraded to a Brutal Critical if it hits.
